glsa.title: LibreOffice, OpenOffice: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in both LibreOffice and OpenOffice, the worst of which allows for the remote execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: LibreOffice is a powerful office suite; its clean interface and powerful tools let you unleash your creativity and grow your productivity.
Apache OpenOffice is the leading open-source office software suite for word processing, spreadsheets, presentations, graphics, databases and more.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in both LibreOffice and OpenOffice. Please review the referenced CVEâ€™s for specific information regarding each.

impact.p: Remote attackers could obtain sensitive information, cause a Denial of Service condition, or execute arbitrary code.

workaround.p: There is no known work around at this time.
